recommendations: Ankush Datar “Kunal worked with us in our Portfolio Management Services department at PhillipCapital India. He is a fast learner and able to pick up things very quickly along with being a hard working professional. He took up key initiatives on his own apart from the existing work, which added great value to the team. I would highly recommend Kunal for any organization as he brings with him an excellent attitude along with the analytical skills which he already possesses. ”

Nicky Kearns “I have been luck enough to have worked with Kunal since the beginning of 2021. From the start, his professionalism and communications skills have impressed me. He is always ready to engage and is focused on positive outcomes. I have no hesitation in recommending him. I look forward to a long and fruitful partnership with Kunal.”
